0.post_text: Own a new BMW from just $1,530/month with high-octane offers! Only at BMW Performance Fest.

1.post_text:
Imagine the Singapore of tomorrow filled with the all-electric #BMWi3. Celebrate our past and discover the future of the automobile at BMW Performance Fest at our showroom this weekend. 

There’s something for everyone—receive special rates and unrivalled overtrades on your favourite BMW models, while re-discovering fun childhood games and relishing scrumptious local cuisines.

4.post_text:
Two weeks ago, we had our successful Facebook live chat and we received numerous questions regarding the BMW Advanced Car Eye. 

Did you know that the BMW Advanced Car Eye is a highly sensitive full-HD camera that detects critical situations while driving and for views when parking?

5.post_text: The future is here. If you could take the #BMWi3 out for a day, where will you take it to?

comments.message:
I had the opportunity to test drive fr 2 days courtesy of BMW Asia...car realli quiet n smooth and realli gets attention everywhere i 
drove....drove 200km..still got 90km range left after 2 days
Depends on what is its range...
I would test the car in morning and evening peak hours where everyone is trying to go work. It's the best time to see how the car would perform.
I will drive it to the scrapyard and have it scrap, the design is horrible!
Bring my family out for a spin.. Keke

Drive to fetch my son from school, then drive to fetch my wife from work, then do some sprited driving. 
My son should be impressed.(he's never taken a electric car yet)
I like to try driving out to attend different events for fashion show or dinner to find out the taste of indivuals, as well as for my work during shoots esp rush hours to test out battery endurance.

Drive it whole day and night.
What good is a car with 120km range on a full charge when you don't drive it much if you can have it for a day?
Can I bring it to Sepang circuit for a test drive? Hmmm
Go to cck Cemetry. Upper pierce n then Changi coastal road. R u giving me or what?
Drive down orchard road n towards garden by the bay
back to the dealer for a trade in
I'd take it to the future...on my driveway :-)
To the market to buy groceries with hatch back easier to load stuff
Go around showing off this beauty to the world. .. so can I have a drive for 1 day?
Wherever you would like me to take it to.. When can i pick up the 🔑?
At that price..... The future for being green in SG is not having one.

6.post_text: To celebrate SG50, our trained BMW Service Technicians will service selected areas of your BMW within 50 minutes. Simply choose your option and before you know it, your BMW will be on your way. Book your BMW service today at http://www.pml.com.sg/bmw/pml50.html.

7.post_text: We hope you enjoyed the delectable mee siam, chicken rice, muah chee and tea eggs we specially prepared for you at our showroom today! Visit us tomorrow at the BMW Performance Fest for more surprises and tell us what you would like to see in the coming weeks.

8.post_text: BMW Performance Fest. Set your pulse racing and own a brand new BMW from just $2,086/month!

9.post_text: Arrive happy with the new BMW ConnectedDrive, which takes driving pleasure to a whole new level with a suite of up to 52 unique services and apps that marry automated driving technology, intelligent navigation and personalised entertainment.

15.post_text: Enjoy ownership of a BMW 316i from $1,530/month or a BMW 520i from $2,087/month!

16.post_text: Were you there with us today at the BMW Performance Fest? If you missed it, join us tomorrow and indulge in SG50 celebratory activities! Also, don't miss exciting offers at our showroom too. We hope to see you there!

17.post_text: This weekend, come on down to 303 Alexandra Road and indulge yourself in SG50 celebratory activities at BMW Performance Fest — from delectable treats to fun-filled activities for your kids!

18.post_text:
Introducing the Performance Motors Limited (PML) 50-Minute Service*, a fast and convenient service for your BMW. With our trained BMW Service Technicians focusing on selected key servicing areas for your BMW, this entire process will be completed within 50 minutes. 
 
So before you even know it, your BMW will be all set to go. Book your BMW service today at http://www.pml.com.sg/bmw/pml50.html.
 
*Terms & Conditions apply. Promotion is valid till 31 Dec 2015.

comments.message: All marketing gimmick. My car went through numerous checks by their Alexandra site and pass on to kampong arang site. All craps and bull... After more than 2 years, lousy and failed diagnosis by those guys in kampung arang. Bottom line, issues still can't be resolved and wrong diagnosis. Especially their workshop manager there, I would say integrity issues making false information in letter to the customer. Bunch of experienced guys??? Think twice. I am just wondering when will BMW Asia wake them up. PML in kampung arang is just nonsense.
My car aircon is faulty since day one.. And they say have to leave my car for at least 2 days or more... And I haven't send it in for repair cos I need my car everyday 😞
I just got my ACTIVE TOURER, the head lamp also have water condenses. the sales man said is normal, WHY ???

Went in for faulty aircon. Technician top up gas and say there's nothing wrong further more with the aircon. After afew days the aircon went off again. And went in service center again, now after serious checking says its evaporator spoilt..$2800 to replace and best of all no spare part. Must wait 3 more days. Went in and went out of the service center. 50mins servicing?  I give it a doubt its gonna be efficient in my own opinion.
Not true that u can replace brakes, battery n change oil plus testing n diagnostic in 50 mins. How dare they put in such an advert? I m sure d BMW mechanics feel goose bumps when they see d video.

Water went into my     F10 520 head lights... service adviser said that IS NORMAL.... sad to hear that from the professional... I do have another Japanese brand vehicle which is 9 yrs old yet to have this problem.....
Poor customer service

BMW stands for Bullshit Morons Waste i mean it is a total waste i just sold my 2010 730li for a lose of 200k it didnt even last a full 5 yrs had problems from the 2nd month of delivery 
Bmw very UNRELIABLE 👇👇👇👇👇👇👇👇👇👇

Zun bo?! Next time must bring a stop watch! Although this is social media marketing, please do not misrepresent. Like the connected drive that you promoted so much lately, should have stated very clearly that it's only for 2014 production so that you dont waste everyone's time calling or even making a trip to your showroom only to find out that it doesn't work on most of their cars.
U should go to CJ . He good . The one you saw in the video . The adviser

50min? That would be a nice improvement! I sent my car in for a routine oil change and it took like 6hours and charged me a bomb!! After my warranty period is over I went to outside service centres instead
50 mins servicing means not complete servicing...time is quality, a rushed job does no good!
Did my servicing yesterday. Not the express service but all done in 2 hours. Superb!
Don't believe. The service is bad n d cost us an arm n a leg
I am not so keen on BMW after I had so many problems from my 320 before. Too many problem to overcome for sheer driving. No more BMW.

PML shall also train their technician to carry out servicing with CARE as the clients have entrusted them to handle their cars. I hope my case is an exceptional and isolated case. Indeed, it was not a good experience.
hahaha...very bad feed back from all BMW owners. PML take back your 50 mins servicing

Regarding your oil Service, it says on the website that it's 'beyond a simple oil change', so what is actually perform as part of oil change service. Comparatively, a routine service by Japanese maker includes oil change and a comprehensive checklist on components and system diagnostic for very much similar pricing to an Oil Change Servicing by PML.
I have my BM 428I service done last week. Change a tyre but it takes 2 hours 15 mins instead of 50mins. But i am fine cause is already so much faster than the past when i send my BM car for service.
Response good ,do not stop at end Dec.
Changed battery on last June and yesterday battery died, less than a year from PML.
Operational efficiency at its best
terms & conditions: no expiry for promotion
Really. My car are due for service soon.. Tq for update bro👍
Do you guys know what's the relationship between PML and BMW Asia?

19.post_text:
Have a burning question about our Aftersales Service or our newly-launched PML 50-Minute Service? Simply post your questions here and our Customer Service Advisors, Christian James and Annabelle Lim, will begin answering them live on our Facebook page from 3pm-4pm.
Find out more about the PML 50-Minute Service at http://www.pml.com.sg/bmw/pml50.html.

comments.message:
Thank you everyone for your questions and private messages! It’s been really interesting and helpful to hear your questions and comments. We will be doing more Q&As in the future, so we hope to see you soon! 

For those who have taken part in our Q&A, you will receive a small token of appreciation from us. Do private message us your full name, contact details and address via Facebook. Thank you - CJ & Annabelle

I like to comment further.... the phone is always busy. Your car go in n so many car claiming warranty n so there is congestions. Careful if car kana scratch or bang. 50 min service is fast but will you forget to screw something back or fail to do qc checks. Dun tell me you will cos you fail my standards. Next warranty items complain got sound... csm say holiday come back next week. Then next week say sorry cannot claim warranty. Dun waste time give wareanty if u cant do it. A lot of promises but never fullfill. I rather pay outside then letting pml touch my car.
So many ??? But where is an answer and is it really works or help all BMW owner Haiz...

Munich is a better choice. Correct me if i am wrong or feel free to challenge my words here.
